GDScript.zh_des: 用戈多制作的代码编辑器。代码从来没有像现在这样明亮！
GDScript.name: face-hh /griddycode
GDScript.description: A code editor made with Godot. Code has never been more lit!

GDScript.zh_des: 开源Roblox & UEFN替代品让你自由拥有你所创造的东西。基于Godot构建的多功能、实时、协作游戏开发平台。
GDScript.name: the-mirror-gdp /the-mirror
GDScript.description: The open-source Roblox & UEFN alternative giving you freedom to own what you create. An all-in-one, real-time, collaborative game development platform built on Godot.

GDScript.zh_des: 项目文件，我们的视频制作您的第一个游戏在戈多。
GDScript.name: Brackeys /first-game-in-godot
GDScript.description: Project files for our video on making your first game in Godot.
